alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 14 at 3:41PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 possible. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Pointe Coupee, West Feliciana, East Feliciana, St. Helena, Washington and Northern Tangipahoa Parishes. In Mississippi, Wilkinson, Amite, Pike and Walthall Counties. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
